original_text: I looked up, and there before me was a ram with two horns, standing beside the canal, and the horns were long. One of the horns was longer than the other but grew up later.
korean_text: 내가 눈을 들어 본즉 강 가에 두 뿔 가진 숫양이 섰는데 그 두 뿔이 다 길었으며 그 중 한 뿔은 다른 뿔보다 길었고 그 긴 것은 나중에 난 것이더라

sentences.original_text: and there before me was a ram
sentences.korean_translation: 내 앞에 수양 한 마리가 섰고

sentences.original_text: One of the horns was longer than the other
sentences.korean_translation: 그 뿔 중 하나가 다른 것보다 더 컸고
